name: Zombies (moud)
description:
Game created for Untitled Game Jam #31, theme:

Low Budget Clone of an Existing Game

The game is a clone of Call of Duty: Nazi Zombies. 

WASD to move, mouse to look.

Hold E to repair window planks.

Press B to buy guns / ammo.

Mouse1 to shoot.

ESC for menu.

Zombies spawn in waves. Each wave adding to the total number of zombies per wave and each zombies health.

Kill zombies to get more cash to buy your way deeper into the house to find more weapons. Opening a door will open a new area of the house, but will also create a new way for zombies to break in.

Fonts:

https://www.fontspace.com/just-my-type-font-f28124

https://www.fontspace.com/no-fear-font-f14936

Audio:

https://opengameart.org/content/5-break-crunch-impacts

https://opengameart.org/content/different-steps-on-wood-stone-leaves-gravel-and-...

https://opengameart.org/content/5-hit-sounds-dying

Sounds (c) by Michel Baradari apollo-music.de:

https://opengameart.org/content/chaingun-pistol-rifle-shotgun-shots

Everything else:

Created by me during the 10 day game jam using Unity, Gimp, Blender, and VSC.
